tool_description: Power Your Pitch - Get Your Pitch Deck Generated Instantly, Powered by AI
name: Pitch Deck Generator
title: Pitch Deck Generator

api_list.name: /generatePitchDeckSlides
api_list.description: Generates a full pitch deck for businesses and entrepreneurs. The deck includes slides for an overview of the company, information about the product, financials, market analysis, and other important topics needed to make a successful pitch.

api_list.name: /generateSimplePitch
api_list.description:
generates a simple pitch deck
For full pitch deck, please use `/generateFullPitch`

api_list.name: /generatePitchOutlines
api_list.description:
StartFragment

provides a quick and easy way to generate outline structures for pitch decks.

EndFragment
